casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 18, 2014

[Cite as 06118/2014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-2631.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0997. Columbus Bar Assn. v. Armengau.

On June 18, 2014, respondent filed a motion for an order staying all proceedings.

Upon consideration thereof, it is ordered by the court that relator shall file a response, if any, to respondent’s motion by 12:00 p.m. on June 19, 2014.
